content.raw: For arenas testing I'm using the same launch file but without run_pub_atlas_command. It is generating movement in the robot, isn't it? If the plan is leave this launch for logging, it sound reasonable to take this out. If you want to keep this launch working as now, we could split the rest into another launch that will be used by ros_subscriber and arenas testing.
